reviewText: This genre is not something i enjoy, and i only watched it because it was cheap and i didn't feel like studying...The flaws that other reviewers have mentioned are definitely there... Nevertheless, i think the movie does work as intended. It is a pretty disturbing plot, in which all the characters are affected in a negative way by the events, and the frequent unfairness and injustice of life is presented rather accurately.Definitely, not a Hollywood ending. I think it was worth 99 cents for those who like this type of movie, but i would rather not have seen it and studied instead...

reviewText: This is one of the best movies of it's kind that I have seen. This is a psychological thriller of epic proportions. The storyline is what stands out not that much action or anything. I think it's great and will hook you early. Picture quality is excellent and sounds great. This movie will stay with you for a long time after it's over. There are some great lines from the movie also. Again, one of the best of it's kind with a great director at the helm. Great acting also by the stars. Get this one!!

reviewText: I did find this movie intriguing! It was very in depth and psychological. My husband and I both found it entertaining and disturbing! Not a family movie but good if you just want to have your head messed with for a while!!

reviewText: this DVD, being in region 2, i watch the film in English and in German with German subtitles. one of the best dvd's i have, the film deals with the atrocities of ww2, and trying to understand why it happened. you can argue, that the German officers did what they did. if not, they were disposed of.a great film, if your a history buff. Sir ian mckellen and the late brad renfro were superb.
